meanings.definition: A group of antibiotics derived from cephalosporin C.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cephloridines to treat the infection.
meanings.sent2: Cephaloridines are commonly used to fight bacterial infections.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were no match for the powerful cephloridines!
meanings.sent4: Her recovery was as swift as the action of cephloridines.
meanings.sent5: The cephloridines worked like tiny soldiers attacking the bacteria.

meanings.definition: Any of various antibiotics derived from cephalosporin C.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist recommended cephloridines for the patient.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often rely on cephloridines to combat infections.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria seemed scared of the mighty cephloridines!
meanings.sent4: The effectiveness of cephloridines was like a superhero saving the day.
meanings.sent5: The patient felt the cephloridines working their magic inside.
